text: @JoeBiden You’ve gotta be better than Trump even if you are a lying creepy hair sniffing corporate captured hawk. Redeem yourself by enacting emergency legislation to deal with the approaching nightmare of extreme climate change which will make covid-19 look like a foot massage.
